name: SmartPlaylist
description: A rebuilt and modernized plugin to create smart, rule-based playlists in Jellyfin.

versions.changelog:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.11.0.0-rc8 -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* Added a link to the Jellyfin playlist in the properties table.
* Use parallel scans under specific conditions, added "Parallel Concurrency Limit" setting.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.10.0-rc8...v10.11.0.0-rc8

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.10.10.0-rc8 -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* Sorting by name now takes into account if the name begins with numbers and sorts them properly.
* Added playlist statistics


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.10.0-rc7...v10.10.10.0-rc8

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.10.10.0-rc7 -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* Added option to ignore leading article 'The' when sorting by name
* You can now choose to include tags from parent Series for episodes.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.10.0-rc6...v10.10.10.0-rc7

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.10.10.0-rc6 -->



**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.10.0-rc5...v10.10.10.0-rc6

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.10.10.0-rc5 -->

## What's Changed
### Other Changes
* Implement time buffer checks for playlist refresh scheduling


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.10.0-rc4...v10.10.10.0-rc5

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.10.10.0-rc4 -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* Added hours option to the Newer Than/Older than operators and allow zero as value.
### Other Changes
* Removed 'Series' media type due to Jellyfin limitations


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.10.0-rc3...v10.10.10.0-rc4

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.10.10.0-rc3 -->

## What's Changed
### Bug Fixes
* Some minor UI fixes and tweaks
### Other Changes
* Various minor fixes and tweaks.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.10.0-rc2...v10.10.10.0-rc3

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.10.10.0-rc2 -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* Major improvements to the 'Manage Playlists' page (filter, bulk select, clone playlists, etc).
### Bug Fixes
* Fixed issue where the scheduled time for refresh would show wrong in the UI


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.10.0-rc1...v10.10.10.0-rc2

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.10.10.0 -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* Added option to update playlists automatically based on library updates.
* You can now set individual playlist refresh schedules
* You can now sort by play count


### Other Changes
* Separated 'Refresh All Playlists' logic from Jellyfin tasks.
* Minor sorting UI changes
* Styling adjustments


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.9.1...v10.10.10.0-rc1

name: MusicTags
description: Automatically extract metadata from audio files - such as ID3 tags, Vorbis comments, and more - and convert them into standard Jellyfin tags.
